resources.string: Ready to lock. Tap to open.
Try connecting to a Bluetooth device
Super Smart Key requires device admin to lock this device when the connected key is out of range.
Location permissions are required to connect to Bluetooth devices and use them as keys.
Location permissions are required to connect to Bluetooth devices and use them as keys.\nThis can be enabled in app info.
Location permissions are required to find BLE Beacons.\nBluetooth permissions are required to connect to Bluetooth devices and use them as keys.
Location permissions are required to find BLE Beacons.\nBluetooth permissions are required to connect to Bluetooth devices and use them as keys.\nThese can be enabled in app info
